original_title: Mallorca - Dream destinations of our Earth
overview: Mallorca is part of the archipelago of the Balearic Islands and is 3680 mÂ², the largest of the Balearic Islands. Mallorca has a wide, beautiful sandy beaches, tiny coves, rocky cliffs and romantic anchorages, rich natural dune beaches with undeveloped hinterland and secluded beaches for swimming fun together - can be found on Majorca each his own paradise.
title: Mallorca - Dream destinations of our Earth
